name: Association of Credit Card Issuers in Europe
goal: ACCIE aims to ensure that the interests of its specialized European credit card issuing-members are fairly and appropriately represented in relevant EU and/or national regulatory discussions and related decision making processes.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market
euInitiatives: Implementation PSDII including RTS, Interchange Fee Regulation, Geo-blocking, RFS action plan, Fintech, Dynamic currency conversion
